Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Chatham Prop. 1 of 2 (Police Dept.) -- 15 Mills - M&BOA - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Chatham Proposition No. 1 of 2
(Police Operations and Maintenance)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Chatham, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy a special tax of fifteen (15) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Town (an estimated $29,483 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2038, for the purpose of providing funds for the support of the Town's Police Department, including acquiring, operating and maintaining police equipment?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Chatham Prop. 2 of 2 (General Fund) -- 11 Mills - M&BOA - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Chatham Proposition No. 2 of 2
(General Fund)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Chatham, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy a special tax of eleven (11) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Town (an estimated $21,621 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2038, for the purpose of providing support for the General Fund?
